ygData.subject: RE: dual weild
ygData.msgSnippet: i am like this in game and in RL, absolutely no sense of direction.  been to lower guk 500 times and still need to follow someone around.  LOST YOU!!! Shada
ygData.messageBody:
i am like this in game and in RL, absolutely no sense of direction. been to
lower guk 500 times and still need to follow someone around. "LOST YOU!!!"

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> But even when I am awake, dungeons and me simply get me all
> mixed up. I get
> lost really easy. My group gets real sick of leading me and
> out all the
> time. Run to the zone? You got to be kidding! Of course, it
> dont help when
> the route you take in is different from the route to run out
> and you never
> practice the run out (which I do now - when they take me
> somewhere new)
